SingularWings.Exhibition_and_event1: The system is installed in a care center in Slovakia Košice.

Beatinfo_Health.memo: Enables caregivers to easily monitor clients' health conditions and provide notifications.
Beatinfo_Health.memo1: BEATINFO Web Console helps companies and caregivers to monitor groups of people in real-time, see who is online and receive instant notifications.
Beatinfo_Health.memo2: BEATINFO Web Console allows users to view detailed physiological information for every single user, in real-time.
Beatinfo_Health.memo3: BEATINFO Web Console provides health history for every user. It is possible to browse it by the hour, day month, or week and also generate health reports.
Beatinfo_Health.memo4: Use physiological information data into detailed report information.
Beatinfo_Health.memo5: BEATINFO Web Console allows caregivers to create, organize and manage groups of users, making it easier to track and monitor their health.
Beatinfo_Health.memo7: The manager can set different exercise goals based on needs and then assign them to users within the organization.
Beatinfo_Health.memo8: It keeps a detailed record of the changes in heart rate during exercise.

work_content.3: Localization build with i18n (中 / English / 日文 / Slovensko etc.)
work_content.4: Created real-time dashboard for network monitoring services with socket.io
work_content.5: Customized charts and binded data with ECharts.js.
work_content.6: Embed Google Map with Google Map API.
work_content.8: Use MQTT and WebSocket server to communicate in real time.

work_content.2: Use an email and sms API

work_content.1: Build with HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap, php, MySQL
work_content.2: Embed Google Map with Google Map API.
work_content.3: Embed IPCam, Real Time Streaming Protocol
work_content.4: Develop LINE Bot with LINE API
work_content.5: Customized charts and binded data with Chart.js.

Color_Theme_content: Some colors can be used to theme different parts of website.
Internationalization_content: Internationalization (i18n) is the process of adapting software to support multiple languages. In my website using `ngx-translate` library.
